content.description: The crux of this climb is the first half. Work some voodoo until you gain access to hands and then its game on.
content.location: This can be accessed through the Douglas blvd, folsom lake entrance. ($12 entance fee i believe?) Continue all the way to the back of the 3 mile windy road until you hit the parking lot for Beaks Bight. There are some boulder problems right out of the parking lot that you can't miss, however this boulder problem and a few others are located further. Continue along one of the trails or hike down to the water and follow the water line towards auburn for approx 3/4 mile until you come to a meadow with three large houses up on the hill (the backside of Los Lagos). In this meadow you will find 2 large slabby boulders that you cannot miss.
